Client.Name: Chengdu Codoon Health Technology Co., Ltd.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Codoon Health is committed to improving sub-health problems caused by high blood sugar, hypertension and unbalanced diet. It is a management and service system that provides exercise and diet solutions based on AI data. Users can obtain scientific exercise programs and professional dietary guidance services after testing or health assessment, so as to improve their health and get rid of sub-health. We connect intelligent health devices to collect ultra-high dimensional body data of users and analyze and calibrate their health status. The Health Big Data Joint Laboratory was jointly built with Sichuan University. It transforms the existing research results to form an effective exercise diet solution. We have also built our own team of nutritionists to provide users with a comprehensive diet guidance and service system of intelligent + manual intervention. Codoon Health, a healthy lifestyle.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Promotional videos, texts and videos related to company operations.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: These data will be stored in hard disk and online cloud disk, such as baidu cloud disk.
Project.Please list the provider IDs and locatio: I have not decided the list of sps I will cooperate with.
